turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can i help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many pizza would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so thats 3 pizzas right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and for the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one chicken barbacue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pepperoni and one with just cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me get that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 large pizza. 1 chicken BBQ, 1 pepperoni and 1 cheese only correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 75 dollars, shall we confirm your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizzas are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you have a nice day.
